title: Bushwacker 30902-02 Extend-A-Fender Fender Flares 4pc. Set fits 2000-2002 Toyota Tundra
features: PROTECTION WITH STYLE:  A smooth, contoured look designed with oversize wheels and tires in mind, the Extend-A-Fender Flares provide premium-grade protection with a matte black finish that can be painted to match
WIDER PERFORMANCE-INSPIRED PROFILE. Adds tire coverage for body protection and a broader stance that blends well with contours of your vehicle
CRUCIAL TIRE COVERAGE:  Made to provide extra tire coverage that protects your rig’s body and complies with local laws to keep you legal when running larger wheel & tire packages.
MADE TO LAST. 100% UV-protected to stop unsightly chalking in its tracks. Backed by an industry-leading limited lifetime warranty.

EASY INSTALLATION & PERFECT FITMENT. Minor drilling required and it’s all in the box! Precision-engineered fitment for each specific vehicle using CAD data so we provide protection that fits great and is time tested and trusted in the market
description: Nothing improves the looks of a vehicle quicker than bolting on an oversize wheel & tire combination. Unfortunately, this can leave parts of your truck’s body exposed to potential damage from road hazards, not to mention putting you in violation of the law in many states. Bushwacker Extend-A-Fender Flares are the ideal solution for adding a little extra coverage for those larger tires, without the bulky look of an off-road style flare. Precision designed to install in just minutes and built to stand the test of time, with durable Dura-Flex 2000 ABS construction. They are flexible, UV-resistant and impervious to impacts for a lifetime of worry-free use. Did we mention how great they look? .
